newsitem.title: USA: Community Trust says reached settlement.
newsitem.headline: Community Trust says reached settlement.

text.p: Community Trust Bank N.A. said Friday it had reached settlement in a dispute with a former software vendor which will increase first quarter 1997 earnings by $3.2 million, net of tax.
The settlement will add $4.9 million to income pre-tax, Community Trust said.

Community Trust Bancorp Inc, with $1.8 billion in assets, has offices located in Pikeville, Whitesburg, Ashland, Flemingsburg, Mt. Sterling, Middlesboro, Williamsburg and Versailles and affiliates in Campbellsville and West Liberty.
